list.name: target
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT target_ip FROM targets ORDER BY target_ip

targets.rawSql: SELECT m.started_at as time, t.target_ip as metric, AVG(h.rtt_ms) as value FROM measurements m JOIN targets t ON t.id=m.target_id JOIN hops h ON h.measurement_id=m.id WHERE h.rtt_ms IS NOT NULL AND t.target_ip = CASE WHEN '${target}' = '' THEN t.target_ip ELSE '${target}' END GROUP BY m.started_at, t.target_ip ORDER BY time

SELECT m.started_at as time, t.target_ip as metric, percentile_cont(0.95) within group (order by h.rtt_ms) as value FROM measurements m JOIN targets t ON t.id=m.target_id JOIN hops h ON h.measurement_id=m.id WHERE h.rtt_ms IS NOT NULL AND t.target_ip = CASE WHEN '${target}' = '' THEN t.target_ip ELSE '${target}' END GROUP BY m.started_at, t.target_ip ORDER BY time
